casebody.data:

v.
Melia Brunet DARDAR, as Executor of the Succession of Percy B. Dardar, Sr., et al. Alvin B. Dardar, and Little Lake Oyster Co., LLC

Francis I. Spagnoletti, et al. NO. 2017-CC-2093 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 9, 2018 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.
